edu.umw.twotter

Class Twot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.umw.twotter.Twot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    public class Twot
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, java.io.Serializable
    A class resembling our users The Twot class observes every personal Twet and every feed Twet Extend to SuperTwot for admin functionality admins can remove other accounts, create accounts, delete individual twots (messages) build foonish twots give twots titles
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
